mapper.insert: insert into student (id, pwd, name, grade, age, sex, email, address, phone, mPhone, status) values (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{grade}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{mPhone}, #{status})
mapper.update: update student set name=#{name}, grade=#{grade}, age=#{age}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, phone=#{phone}, mPhone=#{mPhone}, status=#{status} where sno = #{sno}
mapper.select: select * from student order by sno desc, regdate desc
